title: Comfort-fit hoodie
descr: Long-sleeved hoodie for women. Hoodie has a double-layered hood and a kangaroo pocket and comes in two options: only polyester for summer and with soft fleece for winter.

title: Blaser
descr: Regular fit wool-blend blaser. One fake chest pocket and two jetted front pockets.

title: Regular-fit wool jacket
descr: Regular-fit, calf-length coat made from a wool blend. Flap front pockets, buttons down the front and long sleeves. This coat in classy style is very dense and will keep you warm on the cold rainy autumn days.

title: Slim-fit jacket
descr: Double-breasted slim-fit jacket with welt pockets for women.

title: Relaxed-fit jacket
descr: Relaxed fit jacket with notch lapels and long sleeves with decorative buttoning at the cuffs.

title: Trilby hat
descr: Autumn and winter black trilby hat in british style.

title: Roll Neck Sweater
descr: Comfort-fit submariner roll neck wool sweater.

title: Slim-fit jacket
descr: Slim-fit jacket with jetted pockets and notch lapels.

title: T-shirt
subtitle: Explore now!
descr: Relaxed-fit white t-shirt in a soft cotton jersey with a V-neck and a straight hem.

title: Relaxed-fit hoodie
descr: Relaxed fit hoodie from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves and a kangaroo pocket.

title: Bucket hat
descr: Unisex bucket hat in woven fabric with an elastic drawstring for an adjustable fit.

title: Overalls
descr: Blue overalls in rigid cotton denim. Straight leg with a relaxed fit from waist to the hip and a straight cut from thigh to hem.

title: Oversized sweatshirt
descr: Oversized sweatshirt made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

title: Slim-fit Trousers
descr: Slim-fit chinos in soft cotton twill with a zip fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets.

title: Dress
descr: Seamed off the shoulder white dress.

title: Sport Bra
descr: Sport bra. Fabric with a fast-drying function designed to help you dry and cool while exercising. Wide shoulder straps and a racer back.
